targets.queryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.goal_progress.progress_pct') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.goal_progress.progress_pct') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.goal_progress.target_monthly') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.goal_progress.shortfall') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.goal_progress.months_to_goal') AS INTEGER) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.goal_progress_net.current_projected_monthly_net') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.goal_progress_net.progress_pct') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.goal_progress_net.progress_pct') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT as_of_date_local AS time, CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.goal_progress.progress_pct') AS REAL) AS progress, CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.goal_progress_net.progress_pct') AS REAL) AS net_progress FROM snapshot_daily_current WHERE as_of_date_local >= date('now','-90 days') ORDER BY as_of_date_local ASC;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT as_of_date_local AS time, CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.goal_progress.progress_pct') AS REAL) AS progress, CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.goal_progress_net.progress_pct') AS REAL) AS net_progress FROM snapshot_daily_current WHERE as_of_date_local >= date('now','-90 days') ORDER BY as_of_date_local ASC;

panels.title: Months to Goal Trend (90d)
panels.description: How quickly the goal date is approaching. Lower is better. Compares basic projection vs pace-adjusted estimate.

targets.queryText: SELECT (as_of_date_local || 'T00:00:00Z') AS time, CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.goal_progress.months_to_goal') AS REAL) AS "Months to Goal", CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.goal_pace.current_pace.revised_months_to_goal') AS REAL) AS "Revised (Pace-Adjusted)" FROM snapshot_daily_current WHERE as_of_date_local >= date('now','-90 days') ORDER BY as_of_date_local ASC;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT (as_of_date_local || 'T00:00:00Z') AS time, CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.goal_progress.months_to_goal') AS REAL) AS "Months to Goal", CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.goal_pace.current_pace.revised_months_to_goal') AS REAL) AS "Revised (Pace-Adjusted)" FROM snapshot_daily_current WHERE as_of_date_local >= date('now','-90 days') ORDER BY as_of_date_local ASC;
